description: This table stores the historical payer calculated outcomes for quality measures that are received from payers.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PROPORTION_OF_DAYS_COVERED_HX
columns.description: The historical Proportion of Days Covered (PDC)

columns.name: IS_IMPACTABLE_HX_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if there are enough days left in the measurement year that a fill today could move the patient to meet the adherence threshold.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IS_FIRST_FILL_HX_YN
columns.description:
Is this outcome in the First Fill status? This status is where the patient has filled the medication once, but has not filled it a second time. For some measures during this timeframe the patient is not technically in the denominator yet, but once they pick up that second fill they will be.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_IMPACTABLE_HX_YN
